properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT soi.REAL_ID, srp.IMAGE_URL, soi.REAL_SKU , srp.NAME , COUNT(1) AS C , SUM(soi.Item_Price_Amount) AS AMOUNT FROM sc_order_item soi, sc_real_product srp WHERE soi.REAL_ID = srp.id AND soi.PURCHASE_DATE LIKE '{@%#purchaseDate#%}' GROUP BY soi.REAL_SKU ) t ORDER BY t.C desc

SELECT soi.SELLER_SKU , COUNT(1) AS C , SUM(soi.Item_Price_Amount) AS AMOUNT FROM sc_order_item soi, sc_real_product srp WHERE soi.REAL_ID = srp.id AND soi.PURCHASE_DATE LIKE '{@%#purchaseDate#%}' AND soi.real_id = '{@#realId#}' group by soi.seller_sku
